exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy0 := MF.degree m y0 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy0 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x = Iter (cF m) j y_1

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y =>
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0 => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
cF_L1_y_1_y0_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let dy_1 := MF.degree m y_1 in ~ expf m x y0 -> j <= dy_1 - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) (dx + j) x = Iter (cF m) j y_1
cF_L1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x = y_1
cF_L1_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x = Iter (cF m) i x
diff_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> 0 < i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x <> x
diff_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in ~ expf m x y0 -> Iter (cF m1) dx x <> x
degree_y0_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in MF.degree m y0 = MF.degree m y_1
expf_y0_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m y0 y_1
cF_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let x10 := cF_1 m x in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let m1 := L m one x y in cF m1 z = (if eq_dart_dec y0 z then x else if eq_dart_dec x10 z then y_1 else cF m z)
between_expf_L0_4_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m y_0_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_L0_CN_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
nf_L_B_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in let m0 := B m k x in let m1 := L m0 k x (A m k x) in nf m1 = match k with | zero => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in (nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1))%Z | one => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in (nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1))%Z end
between_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in betweenf m x_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_L0_CN_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t
between_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z

not_expf_expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf (L m zero x y) y x0
expf_not_expf_L0_CV : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf (L m zero x y) y x0 -> ~ expf m x_1 y
expf_expf_L0_3_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_not_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf m x_1 y < -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) y x0
y_0_1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cF m y = cA_1 m1 one (top m1 zero x)
MF.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in j < p -> k < p -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k

MA1.LP7 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := MA1.Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (MA1.f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, n0 < j <= nr - 1 -> Iter (MA1.f m) n0 z <> Iter (MA1.f m) j z
y_0_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cA_1 m zero y = top m1 zero x

between_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
expf_L0_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in (if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z \/ expf m z t) -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
MA1.P7 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := MA1.Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (MA1.f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, n0 < j <= nr - 1 -> Iter (MA1.f m) n0 z <> Iter (MA1.f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
MA0.P7 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (MA0.f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, n0 < j <= nr - 1 -> Iter (MA0.f m) n0 z <> Iter (MA0.f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
MF.P7 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := MF.Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (MF.f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, n0 < j <= nr - 1 -> Iter (MF.f m) n0 z <> Iter (MF.f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
expf_L0_x0_y_0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in expf (L m zero x y) x0 y_0_1
expf_L0_y_x_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf (L m zero x y) y x_1
expf_L0_6 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y t -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_2_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_CNS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t < -> (let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0)

```  
intros m x y j H1 H2 m1 y0 y_1 dx dy0 H3 H4 H5.
unfold m1, y0, y_1, dx, dy0. intros H6.
assert (H7: inv_hmap m). apply (proj1 H1).
assert (H8: exd m y0 /\ exd m y). apply (proj1 H2).
assert (H9: cA m zero y <> nil /\ cA m zero y0 <> nil). apply conj.
unfold y0. unfold y0 in H8. apply (proj1 H8).
assert (H10: cA m zero y <> nil). apply (proj1 H9).
apply (MF.degree_L_eq m x y H7 H8 H9).
unfold dy0. apply (proj1 (degree_y0_y_1 m x y H7 (proj1 H2))).
unfold not in H6. destruct H8 as [H8 H11].
rewrite H6. apply H11.
```

original: intros m x y j H1 H2 m1 y0 y_1 dx dy0 H3 H4 H5. unfold m1, y0, y_1, dx, dy0. intros H6. assert (H7: inv_hmap m). apply (proj1 H1). assert (H8: exd m y0 /\ exd m y). apply (proj1 H2). assert (H9: cA m zero y <> nil /\ cA m zero y0 <> nil). apply conj. unfold y0. unfold y0 in H8. apply (proj1 H8). assert (H10: cA m zero y <> nil). apply (proj1 H9). apply (MF.degree_L_eq m x y H7 H8 H9). unfold dy0. apply (proj1 (degree_y0_y_1 m x y H7 (proj1 H2))). unfold not in H6. destruct H8 as [H8 H11]. rewrite H6. apply H11.
